Headline: #18 16th-18th Temporary Reroute at Western/14th
ShortDescription: 18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via 18th, Western, Cermak, Marshall and Ogden due to street blockage near Western/14th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 18th, Western, Cermak, Marshall and Ogden, due to street blockage near Western/14th.

Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#49 Western, #X49 Western Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Western, 18th, Damen, Roosevelt and Western, due to street blockage near Western/14th.

Headline: #22 Clark |Temporary Reroute near Racine/Belmont
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses temp. rerouted SB: Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark; NB: Clark, Belmont, Racine and Clark: due to,st. blockage near Racine/Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Racine/Belmont , due to street blockage near Racine/Belmont.

Southbound buses will operate via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark including the normal route streets at the beginning and end.

Northbound buses will operate via Clark, Belmont, Racine and Clark.

Allow extra travel time.
